elder_speech: Aé esse aecáemm taedh.
english: I will follow you.

elder_speech: Caed ess cáelm an hlaith ess elaine.
english: The forest is peaceful and the lady is beautiful.

elder_speech: Aevon ess cáelm.
english: The river is calm.

elder_speech: Aé mire gwyn blath.
english: I see the white flower.

elder_speech: An luned ess og.
english: A girl is young.

elder_speech: Bleidd ess hen
english: The wolf is old

elder_speech: Addan gleán feainn.
english: Dance below the sun.

elder_speech: An ard ess ard aen dol.
english: A mountain is the highest in the valley.

elder_speech: Yeá, vatt'ghern ess yeá.
english: Yes, witcher is good.

elder_speech: Caed y brokiloéne.
english: "Forest of the Brokilon."

elder_speech: Vatt'ghern esse veloë voe'rle.
english: Witcher will be quickly stop.

elder_speech: Dice aep vatt'ghern na beanna esse marw.
english: Talk to the witcher or woman will die.

elder_speech: Ceádmil vatt'ghern taedh caen dice aep hen evn'gesaen an squaess me aep evellienn.
english: Greetings witcher you can talk to the oldest ambassador and forgive me for everything.

elder_speech: Ceádmil ard evn'gesaen aé éigean dice aep taedh.
english: Greetings the highest ambassador I must talk with you.

elder_speech: Bleidd spar'le ninnau an ninnau éigean raenn.
english: Wolf attacked us and we must run.

elder_speech: Aenye ess elaine an ensh'eass.
english: Fire is beautiful and glamorous.

elder_speech: Dice cáelm.
english: Speak slow.

elder_speech: Aé minne aep addan aep taedh aen aëte aen aevon blathanna.
english: I love to dance with you in the summer by the river of flowers.

elder_speech: An'givare darganfod secret y gwyn bleidd aen caer y deithwen.
english: The spy discovered the secret of the White Wolf in the castle of the White Flame.

elder_speech: Daerienn enchanted king aep glamorous smile an gwennelen skin.
english: The sorceress enchanted the king with glamorous smile and alabaster skin.

elder_speech: Rhenawedd a'baeth eimyr aen abb an mire geas.
english: The princess kissed the hedgehog on the mouth and observed the curse.

elder_speech: Ymladda shaente an shaent ar hlaith y loc an feainne'wedd.
english: The bard sang a song about the Lady of the Lake and Child of the Sun.

elder_speech: D'yaebl sighed an ran vort aen dol y seidh.
english: The beast sighed and ran away from the valley of hills.

elder_speech: Hav'caaren meáth aen mid y pont an agwetheill an morc an an ledwedd.
english: The hawkers met in the middle of the bridge and exchanged a book and a painting.

elder_speech: Rhena luned tearth cáerme que awaited aen ceas'raet y nilfgaard.
english: The queen’s daughter feared the fate that awaited in the empire of Nilfgaard.

elder_speech: Ruadhri spar aenye aen kurgan ui scoia'taelan run.
english: The riders shot fire at the kurgan and the squirrels hid.

elder_speech: Lionors greeted cerbin aep an ceann y ceann.
english: The lioness greeted the raven with a tip of head.

elder_speech: Vatt'ghern tuathe an va faill aep wedd an va aen va'en.
english: The witcher whispered a farewell to the child and went on journey.

elder_speech: Tor y treise rose aen ground an cast an shadow yn tir.
english: The tower of power rose from the ground and cast a shadow over the land.

elder_speech: Wyvern fought aep ard yghern aen caed y woedd.
english: The wyvern fought with the giant centipede in the forest of wood.

elder_speech: Varh'he stopped aen abb an looked back aen gwyn glyph aen craag.
english: The bitch stopped at the door and looked back at the white glyph on the wall.

elder_speech: Wild tirth ran veloë an veloë vort aen ymladda.
english: The wild boar ran fast and quick away from the combat.

elder_speech: Daerienn zvaere aen chaos an swallowed an potion y treise.
english: The sorceress swore by Chaos and swallowed a potion of vigour.

elder_speech: Feainne'wedd vaer'trouv an vaer'trouv aen cáerme.
english: The child of the Sun hoped and trusted in destiny.

elder_speech: Woedd y elle ess gwyn an smooth aen an swallow’s feather.
english: The wood of alder was white and smooth like a swallow’s feather.

elder_speech: Vatt'ghern aef an tvedeane woechina aen gláeddyv an twe aen drád.
english: The witcher had a dozen glyphs on sword and two on face.

elder_speech: Uniade y twe tir ess an uniade y treise.
english: The union of the two countries was a merger of strength.

elder_speech: I love to dance with you in the summer meadow, where the flowers are like a garland.
english: Aé minne aep addan aep taedh aen eate fen, ui blathan ess aen an blathan.

elder_speech: The white wolf is a witcher and rides on a horse Kelpie. White wolf has a sword and a woechina of fire on a face.
english: Gwynbleidd ess an vatt'ghern ui aesledde aen an evall kelpie. Gwynbleidd aef an gláeddyv an an woechina y aenye aen an drád.

elder_speech: The lady of the lake is a sorceress who lives in a tower by the lake. She has a book of magic and a painting of a lioness on a wall.
english: Hlaith y loc ess an daerienn ui lives aen an tor aen loc. Rhenawedd aef an morc an an ledwedd y an lionors aen an craag.

elder_speech: The king of Redania sent his ambassador to greet the emperor of Nilfgaard. He had a sword of ice and a dozen wyverns.
english: Rhon y Roeth sent his evn'gesaen aep ceádmil evn'gesaen y nilfgaard. Aef an gláeddyv y gynvael an an tvedeane vyverne.

elder_speech: Bard sang a song about the fate of the Child of the Sun, who was cursed to be a hedgehog by day and a human by sleep.
english: Ymladda shaente an shaent ar cáerme y feainne'wedd, ess geas esse an eimyr aen ine an an dh'oine aen dearme.

elder_speech: The elf was a squirrel and fought the humans. He wore a garland of heather on his head.
english: Aen seidh ess an scoia'tael ui ymladda dh'oine. Eigean an blathan y heather aen ceann.

elder_speech: The giant centipede attacked the village in the valley. The witcher and the sorceress arrived. The beast ran.
english: Ard yghern spar'le ban aen dol. Vatt'ghern an daerienn cáemm. D'yaebl raenn.

elder_speech: Princess was a banshee who haunted the castle. Princess was like death, hoping that king would hear, arrive at the castel and fight the curse.
english: Rhenawedd ess an beann'shie ui spar'le caer. Rhenawedd ess aen vhóel, vaer'trouv que rhoun esse, cáemm aen caer ui ymladda an geas.

elder_speech: Hawkers were a gang who sarved wares and drugs in the village.
english: Hav'caaren ess an hanse y deien aen deien vara an haela aen ban.

elder_speech: Swallow was a symbol of hope and destiny for the witcher and the sorceress. They met each other in times of chaos, and they fell in love.
english: Zireael ess an y vaer'trouv an cáerme aep vatt'ghern an daerienn. Meáth aen thaesse y chaos, an aen minne.

elder_speech: The witcher and the sorceress rode on a sleigh in the forest of Brokilon. They were followed by the dryads, who offered them a water from the enchanting lake.
english: Vatt'ghern an daerienn rode aen an sledd aen caed y brokilon. Ess aecáemm aen dryads, who offered them an water aen ensh'eass loc.

elder_speech: The empite of Nilfgaard was a white flame who wanted to conquer. Powerful black riders and a spy in the court of Redania.
english: Ceas'raet y nilfgaard ess an deithwen un aep conquer. Treise dhu ruadhri: an an'givare aen Roeth.

elder_speech: The witcher had a dream of his mother, who died when he was young. She enlighted him to follow his destiny and find the Child of the Sun, who was his true love.
english: Vatt'ghern an dearme y modron, marw he ess og. Aine aep aecáemm his cáerme an darganfod feainne'wedd, ess yeá minne.

elder_speech: The Child of the Sun was cursed by a sorcerer who loved the power.
english: Feainne'wedd ess cursed aen an daerienn minne treise.

elder_speech: A poet and a bard, sang a book about the witcher and the sorceress, and love for the Child of the Sun.
english: An taedh an an ymladda, an morc ar vatt'ghern an daerienn, an minne aep feainne'wedd.

elder_speech: A spy in the court of Redania.
english: An an'givare aen court y Roeth.
